muhtaram was stabbed to death by her

Oscar John was killed in a minibus and
that struck a strong chord in Turkey
many women thought it could have been me
women's rights organizations say
violence against women has risen shortly
in the last decade many women think it's
time to take control of their lives in
Turkey there are so many men you know
governing and so many men deciding on
our point of view what we should do
about you know how many children we
should have or about abortion and all
these kind of things you know there are
so many male power deciding what we want
to do feminists are cautiously
optimistic
they hope as gay Jones murder will
become a watershed moment the job is
really katya ugly society always finds
excuses to justify the rape and murder
of women but now there is no excuse to
whitewash the murder women and men from
all political backgrounds have been
protesting since Oscar John's death I
think this gives a hopeful message for
Turkey protests still carry on though
much smaller in size due to bad weather
Oscar John Aslan might become the face
